title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS MITSUBISHI TRITON 3.2L/2.5L – FUEL MANAGER PRE FILTER WATER SEPARATOR KIT FM622DPK

content.rendered:
WESTERN FILTERS MITSUBISHI TRITON 3.2L/2.5L – FUEL MANAGER PRE FILTER WATER SEPARATOR KIT FM622DPK

Western Filters Mitsubishi Triton 3.2L & 2.5L Fuel Manager Pre Filter Water Separator Kit FM622DPK available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

Fuel Manager Separator Kit FM622DPK for:

  • Mitsubishi Triton Common Rail Engines
    • (2008 – 2015) MN 2.5L 4D56 & (2006-2009) ML 3.2L 4M41

This Filter unit is to be used as a Pre Filter to separate water & contaminates thus avoiding costly repairs due to poor fuel quality. This kit includes very detailed fitting instructions and everything you will need & even where to fit it!

Kit Includes:

  • 1x Fuel Filtration Unit Fuel Manager – Made by Stanadyne in the USA (Filters down to 30 Microns!)
  • Mounting Bolts, washers & Nyloc nuts
  • Spare 30 Micron Filter
  • 1 Mtr of 12mm Quality Fuel hose
  • Specially Designed Filter Mounting Bracket
  • 90 degree brass fittings
  • 12mm barbed tails
  • Blanking Plugs
  • Hose Clamps
  • 6mm mounting bolts
  • Thread Paste Sealant (6ml Tube)

To view the full range of products available for your Triton, CLICK HERE!

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
